name: ITP007 Balconies & communal areas under tiles
template name: ITP007 Balconies & communal areas under tiles

name: Set out known ie extent and location of windows with respect to sill
Concrete is patched and free of holes on surface
Perform visual check of work area for:
Clean, smooth, firm, continuous surface and free from loose or foreign matter.
Remove any dags or excessive projections that may interfere with the membrane.
Prime all surfaces with Epocote F100W Clear Primer
Fill any penetrations / voids flush to ensure a continuous surface, apply coving fillet of Polyurethane sealant to all internal corners
1st Application: Membrane Application to all upturns prior to painting by others. – GCP Newflex at 1.5mm WFT measured using Wet Film Gauge
2nd Application: coating to all deck areas ensuring a lap is achieved to the original turnouts. GCP Newflex at 1.5mm WFT measured using Wet Film Gauge
FINAL INSPECTION – check surface for defects in the membrane, make repairs as necessary /
